channel.title: RuneLove 3
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/okcqrn.png[/img] Well since the team and project kinda died off we've decided to just release it. Sundays and myself are going to start a complete scratch framework based of one of Grahams designs.
Client/Server: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!R8pSVKbQ!Ulcti0XN5WTUU-XRo3cQhxm4MxYCicjxzZx0l0PzNkg]https://mega.co.nz/#!R8pSVKbQ!Ulcti0XN5WTUU-XRo3cQhxm4MxYCicjxzZx0l0PzNkg[/url] cache: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!EMISCJ4Q!bfVRnwS92HylQX38yp6RbapXYQi1RTWuznK0L8Lo0wg]https://mega.co.nz/#!EMISCJ4Q!bfVRnwS92HylQX38yp6RbapXYQi1RTWuznK0L8Lo0wg[/url]
The Client is probably the most renamed rs3 client that has been released(if you dont like the naming then change it and shut up)
[u][b]Credits[/b][/u] Jamie Moore Taylor Moon Sundays211 Kyle Fritz
[B][U]Notable Features[/U][/B] Almost Every Packet Documented Player Update NPC Update Object, NPC Interactions A few skills Clan/clan chat base great interface system json saving(Clan info, players ect)
[u][b]Interface System[/b][/u] http://pastie.org/9335654 http://pastie.org/9335656 http://pastie.org/9335658
[u][b] Pictures[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oadK4Ok.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c208BUx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FQmYG2y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rcu7CSD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aRs8ubL.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a6G7zTO.jpg[/img]
[/center]

item.title: RuneLove 3

item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[center]
Well since the team and project kinda died off we’ve decided to just release it.
Sundays and myself are going to start a complete scratch framework based of one of Grahams designs.

Client/Server: https://mega.co.nz/#!R8pSVKbQ!Ulcti0XN5WTUU-XRo3cQhxm4MxYCicjxzZx0l0PzNkg
cache: https://mega.co.nz/#!EMISCJ4Q!bfVRnwS92HylQX38yp6RbapXYQi1RTWuznK0L8Lo0wg

The Client is probably the most renamed rs3 client that has been released(if you dont like the naming then change it and shut up)

Credits
Jamie Moore
Taylor Moon
Sundays211
Kyle Fritz

[B][U]Notable Features[/U][/B]
Almost Every Packet Documented
Player Update
NPC Update
Object, NPC Interactions
A few skills
Clan/clan chat base
great interface system
json saving(Clan info, players ect)
